description: Number of n-node rooted identity trees of height 4.
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 5..97
Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
maple: weigh:= proc(p) proc(n) local x, k; coeff(series(mul((1+x^k)^p(k), k=1..n), x, n+1), x, n) end end: wsh:= p-> n-> weigh(p)(n-1): f:= n-> `if`(n>0 and n<12, [1$3, 2$5, 1$3][n], 0): a:= wsh(f)-f: seq(a(n), n=5..97); # _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 10 2008
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Jan 04 1999
